title: Person of Interest opening intros [1-4]
author: guessWho66666fy
comment: One of the best shows ever!

also liked the little bit where Finch looks into a camera and says "is your number up?"

am i the only one who loves his voice by the way? he sounds so calm in almost every situation as far as i have seen, rarely ever freaks out and even when he does there is still a sense of reserved calmness in that too. idk i just really like his voice and the way he talks.
Ramin Djawadi just nailed his background scores🙏 Best series ever made. Hope they revive this series.
I LOVE LOVE LOVE how it switches from "You are being watched" to "WE are being watched." Such a small detail, but such an important one
I like the different intros, and above all, I like the small detail that always change at the end of each intro, if your number is up, "okay that's the guy/girl" of today, pretty cool I say.
description: Compilation of Person Of Interest openings intros from season 1 to 4. I added a 'lil bonus when Root had few lines in the intro in season 2.
